sexual_harassment_act.description: The specific act of sexual harassment committed (A, B, C, or D of 354A).

against_a_woman.description: Whether the victim is a woman.

physical_contact_and_advances.description: Did the offense involve physical contact and advances involving unwelcome and explicit sexual overtures? (Section 354A(1)(i)).

demand_or_request_for_sexual_favours.description: Did the offense involve a demand or request for sexual favours? (Section 354A(1)(ii)).

showing_pornography_against_will.description: Did the offense involve showing pornography against the will of a woman? (Section 354A(1)(iii)).

making_sexually_coloured_remarks.description: Did the offense involve making sexually coloured remarks? (Section 354A(1)(iv)).

case_title.description: The full case title with parties (e.g., 'A.K. Goel vs. State of Delhi').

court_name.description: The name of the court that delivered the judgment (e.g., 'High Court of Delhi').

judgment_date.description: The date the judgment was delivered (e.g., '15th March, 2012').

appellant_or_petitioner.description: The name(s) of the appellant or petitioner.

judges_coram.description: The name(s) of the judge(s) who delivered the judgment.

sections_invoked.description: List of legal sections invoked in the case.

case_type.description: The type of case (e.g., 'Criminal Appeal', 'Writ Petition').

acts_and_sections.description: Acts and sections involved in the case.
